title: BMW's electric future, R&D spending to hit record
text:
BMW's electric future, R&D spending to hit record Wednesday, March 21, 2018 - 01:08 
German carmaker BMW will increase research and development spending to an all-time high of up to 7 billion euros ($8.6 billion) this year as part of efforts to bring 25 electrified models to market by 2025. Ciara Lee reports ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
German carmaker BMW will increase research and development spending to an all-time high of up to 7 billion euros ($8.6 billion) this year as part of efforts to bring 25 electrified models to market by 2025.
